author: Steven Nelson
title: Border Patrol union backs Pennsylvania GOP Senate contender McCormick

sentence: A super PAC supporting Rep. Conor Lamb for U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania made two misleading claims about the Democratic front-runner, John Fetterman, one of which resulted in a Philadelphia TV station pulling the ad.
author: Robert Farley
title: Pro-Lamb Super PAC Misfires in Attack Ad Against Fetterman

sentence: Candidates who have committed to attend include: John Fetterman, Malcolm Kenyatta, and Conor Lamb Questions for the Democratic Senate candidates can also be submitted by emailing WHTMDigital@nexstar.tv, using the hashtag #PASen, or by sharing your question on Facebook.
author: George Stockburger
title: abc27 Pennsylvania GOP Governor Debate: What are your questions for the candidates?

author: John Gizzi
title: Trafalgar Poll: Pennsylvania GOP Senate Primary Wide Open
